page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN IRWELL VALLEY
page.content: The area we live in has not got much industry,but the things that are made are varied.There are small crafts like a silversmith's and major firms like the big paper works,Fort Sterling.We wrote to a few of the companies and they replied with information about their processes.Amongst the things made in our area are :{ {springs,engraving,construction,soaps, {upholstery,tissue paper,furniture, {hand-made paper,welding supplies, {stainless steel products,packaging, {industrial textiles,building {materials,agricultural plant hire, } {engineering products,and onyx stone {objects.} There is an industrial estate in Stubbins called 'Cuba' where much of the industry is situated.
